rows.label: tev000293_MSG0001
rows.name: A fine day to you, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0002
rows.name:
Look at the way this cat is staring at us with such
expectant eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0003
rows.name:
Perhaps it is aware that it has reached its peak
of quality, and is eager to be cooked and eaten?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_JNK0010
rows.name: Intervene

rows.label: tev000293_SEL0011
rows.name: Insist that cats are not food.

rows.label: tev000293_JNK0020
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: tev000293_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain to L that the cat is probably just hungry.

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hmmm... We wondered why no one else had beaten
us to it. It is forbidden to eat cats? Categorically?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0005
rows.name:
We mean no disrespect, but this human custom strikes
us as peculiar. After all, you eat birds, do you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0006
rows.name:
Of course, we understand why you would refrain from
eating Nopon as the Prone do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0007
rows.name:
The Nopon are beings that are capable of
communicating with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0008
rows.name:
But neither cats nor chickens can speak.
So then, what means do you use to determine
which are food and which are not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0009
rows.name:
So that expression is used to extract food from
humans? How interesting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0010
rows.name:
We must admit that we have yet to make a proper
study of these creatures, and there is much we do not
understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0011
rows.name:
For example, we are confused as to why humans
regard these creatures with affection while showing
little regard to othersâ€”such as chickens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0012
rows.name:
Are some to be eaten and others not?
On what basis do you make that distinction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_JNK0030
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: tev000293_SEL0031
rows.name: Answer that different cultures have different customs.

rows.label: tev000293_JNK0040
rows.name: Admit

rows.label: tev000293_SEL0041
rows.name:
Explain to L how humans usually
care more about cute-looking animals.

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0013
rows.name:
How interesting. So even within humanity,
different cultures create different rules.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0014
rows.name:
It's all so terribly vague and difficult for us xenoforms
to understand. But perhaps that is typical of humanity?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0015
rows.name: We see. But even that is a highly subjective distinction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0016
rows.name: Then again, perhaps that is typical of humanity?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0017
rows.name: Well, different strikes for different blokes, as you say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0018
rows.name:
This diversity seems to be one of humanity's
defining features.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0019
rows.name:
For example, our inventions occasionally have minor
defects that may lead to suboptimal user experiences,
such as electrocution or severe burns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0020
rows.name:
When we upset a Ma-non, we give the complainant
a pizza and all is forgiven. But humans are seldom
mollified by cheese-covered dough disks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0021
rows.name:
Instead, we must listen to each human's grievances and
respond individually. It's quite tiresome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0022
rows.name:
But ultimately, humanity is stronger for such diversity.
It's what gives you such limitless potential.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0023
rows.name:
We would like to learn more about humanity,
to witness the breadth of your potential firsthand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0024
rows.name:
Perhaps rearing a cat would give us some valuable
insight into this matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000293_MSG0025
rows.name:
And as you humans say, he who hesitates is a loser.
We will speak to Defense Secretary Nagi and ask him
to requisition a cat for us immediately![ST:wait ]
